name: Share Your Wordle Grid
description:
Share your Wordle victories (or losses!) to social media with this easy-to-use builder. 


  • Multiple variations with light and dark mode, flat and skeuomorphic textures. 
  • Quickly swap block styles using variants. 
  • Add game statistics and customize with your personal information. 
  • Built with auto-layout. 


Disclaimer: This file cannot be used to play Wordle. 


Credit: Wordle - A daily word game by Josh Wardle (@powerlanguish). 


-

Jello (@madewithjello)


What's new?


Jan 18, 2022: 

  1. Advanced statistics now available with guess distribution and more. 
  2. Added ‘Color Blind Mode’ with high contrast colors.
